src_text: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
ref_text: In França, votar ‘l é staita tradizionalment un mister a bassa utillizazion de tecnollojia: a i elletor a se islen ind una cabina, meten un fòi de carta prestampad qe ‘l indicia ‘l lor candidad preferid in una busta.
hyp_text: In Francia, i vòt i eren tradiziunàlment un esperiènsa basada su de tecnologgiie basa: i vòt i s’isolaven in una cabina, i metéven in un bocchett a stampa un fòmm che ‘l dava a sàpp i candidàtt ch’i voreven.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

src_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

src_text: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
ref_text: Quand qe un grup picen de vesser vivents (una popollazion picena) ‘l ven separad de la popollazion principalla de indova a i ven ( se par esempi a i se sposten in su i monts o un fium, o se i vann ind una nœva isla in manera qe a i pœden minga tornar indré belfar) despes a i trovaeran un ambient divers de qell indove a i se trovaven inanz.
hyp_text: Quand un gruppic de vivent (una piccola populaziùn) 'l se separa dal gruppic dal vivent dal qual gh'è vengiud (comé quand i passen söl un rist di montagn o d'una rivéra, o quand i passen in un'isola nova perche i no i pöden pasà indree) i se troaven giamò in un ambient different dal quél che i gh'èra prima.

src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

hyp_text: Dopu che i i combattiment i s’è inn aghiz, el Regn Unì ‘l gh’ha inizzià un bloch marìtt de la Germania.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

src_text: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
ref_text: La strategìa la s’è rivelàda efìcàs e l’ha taià i furnidür militàr e i rifurnimént per i civii, anca se sto blocch l’ha viulaa i legi internaziunài in géner acetaa chi eren sta cudificaa de vari acòrdi internaziunài di ültim dù secùi.
hyp_text: La strategia a l'ha pruvedüd èfficent, cun la còta di suprìss, ma i l'ha violad la lèg internazionala, codifegada da di acòrd internazional de di dò centenàr.

src_text: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
ref_text: Anca tra ogni dinastìa ghera ün mumént instàbil de pruvinci dividuu. El püssé cognossü di sti periòdi l’era l’epòca di Tri Régn che l’era dürada 60 ann tra la dinastìa Han e quéla Jin.
hyp_text: Anca tra ‘na dinastia e l’altra gh’è stai un’èra de crisi in qe i provincc i eren divise. La pì famusa di sti èr i è stai la Èra di i Tre Regn che la g’è durada 60 ann tra la Dinastia Han e la Dinastia Jin.

hyp_text: In di temp, i gh’è staa na guerra fòrta tra i nobil che i gh’eran combatüü per el trù.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: I Tri Règn ieren staa vün di epòch püssé sanguinusi in te la storìa de la Cina antìca, miaia de gént ieren mòrt in tel cumbàt per vèch el ségio püssé vòlt al grand palàzz de Xi’an.
hyp_text: El Trei Regn ‘l é stà un di periodi cö l'é stà el pi sanginö in la storia de la Cina antiga, qand i gh'é stà mila de persùnn qe i s'han scumazià per savè a sèder in la càra pi granda in la gran palazz a Xi’an.

src_text: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
ref_text: El determinismo tecnològico l'è ön espressione ca la té 'nzema piö edèe, da la spinta de 'nnovaziù o anca l'imperativo tecnològico, che 'n senso strich al sarés pensà qe il destìn di òmen l’è guidàà da üna prufunda logìca ligàda ai princìpi scentìfic e la sò applicaziun dent la technologìa.
hyp_text: El determinism tecnologich ‘l é un terma qe ‘l comprend un vast ragn de idee in pràtiga, dal push tecnologich o el imperativ tecnologich a una streta sens che la destina uman ‘l sia spinguda da na lògica sotstante associada ai legg sciéntific e lor manifestaziùn in tecnologia.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: Si en parla de determinismo tecnològico en g’ha düü grand pensèè: vün qe el svilùp tecnològico và mia drèè dumò a la coltùra e a la pulitica, e l’olter qe la tecnologìa l’è mia cundiziunàda da la societàà ma la se manifèsta dènt a ésa.
hyp_text: Tücc le interpretaziùn de la determinism tecnicch divènten in di doi pensi general: che el svilüp del tecnicch el varda inanz ind un pàss indipendènt da influenz culturèl o politicch e che el tecnicch el gh'à "efecc" in di societè che i sò innècc, nò socèl condizionèd.

src_text: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
ref_text: Sti fiolitt ienn ciamàà “selvatèg”. En quai fiolitt selvatèg l’è sta cunfinaa di gént (de solìt el sò pà e màma); in olter càs l’abandùn del fiöö l’era sta causà perchè el pà e la màma refudaven i pesaant limìt inteletuai e fiseg del fiöö.
hyp_text: I persùnn chi i gh'hann di problemi psicologich i henn ciamà "feral" o "selvàtich". Di feral i henn stàit confinà per i ümàn (solitamènt i sò parènt) e in di cas i henn stàit abandunà a cåsa parca i parènt i gh'aven la repulsiùn de i problemi psicologich di sò fij.

src_text: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
ref_text: Quand l’è staa del tüt tirà sü da animai che ienn mia umàn, el fiöö selvatèg el demòstra di cumpurtamént (cun limìt fiseg) che ienn quasi tutalmént cumpàgn a quei del animàl particulàr che ghe sta inséma, cuma la pagüra o indiferènsa ai umàn.
hyp_text: Quand i se crèssen cumplettamènt da animal nömm, i figli salvatij i mostrèven comportamènt (dentrum di limit fiscà) quasi tuti come chel de l'animal che i g'ha curà, cumè per esempi i gh'avè paur de o indifferènsia a i umàn.

src_text: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
ref_text: Se l’aprendimént basà sü prugèt al dovarés fa diventà l’aprendimént püssé facìl e interessant, el sistéma de süpport va oltra.
hyp_text: Mentri la cèrti larni di basà su di pròjet la deuvra fà el apprendimènt pi facìl e pi interessànt, la scaffaldàziùn la va pàr di pàr.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
[Lombard]:

src_text: Scaffolding is not a method of learning but rather an aid that provides support to individuals whom are undergoing a new learning experience such as using a new computer program or beginning a new project.
ref_text: El sistéma de süpport l’è mia ün metod ma pütòst ün jütt che ‘l furnìss süpport a colòr chi van incontra a üna növa esperiénza de aprendimént cuma el doprà ün nöf prugram per computer o cumincià ün nöf pruget.
hyp_text: La scaffolding ‘l é minga un mètud de apprendiment ma in aiüt chi ‘l g’ha da suportà i persùnn chi i fann un apprendiment nöf, come per esempi, quand i apprenden a usà un programm nöf del computer o quand i còmen un növ progett.

src_text: Scaffolds can be both virtual and real, in other words, a teacher is a form of scaffold but so is the little paperclip man in Microsoft Office.
ref_text: El sistéma de süpport pò vès virtual o reàl, in olter paroli, l’insegnant l’è üna fòrma de süpport ma anca la grafetìna animàda in Microsoft Office.
hyp_text: I scaffald i poeṅ esser virtual e real, in altri scun, un maestru el é un scaffald ma anca l'omètt che la Microsoft Office.

src_text: Virtual Scaffolds are internalized in the software and are meant to question, prompt, and explain procedures that may have been to challenging for the student to handle alone.
ref_text: El süpport virtuàl l’è dént al software e l’è lì per mètt in discussiùn, sügerir e spiegà quei procedür che i pudarés vès dificìl de gestì dal stüdent deperlü.
hyp_text: I scaffold virtuali i saressen interni in del software e i ghavessen da fà qüestión, stimulà e spiegà i procediment ch'i saressen stàa trop dìfìcil per el student a fà sü da sol.

src_text: Domestic goats were generally kept in herds that wandered on hills or other grazing areas, often tended by goatherds who were frequently children or adolescents, similar to the more widely known shepherd. These methods of herding are still used today.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

src_text: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.

hyp_text: In di regiùn d'intern del Nord de l'India e del Pakistan, el iughurt l'é d'usà in di curri; in di regiùn del Sud de l'India e di àlter regiùn costiér del subcontinent, el lat de cocò l'é d'usà in di curri.

src_text: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref_text: Adèss largamént dispunìbil in tütt l’arcipelàgh, la cüsina de Giava la ghà üna varietaa de piàtt cundii in manéra semplìx, i savùr duminànt chi i piasén ai giavanés ienn i spagnolètt, i peveronin, el züchér (specialmént el züchér de coco giavanés) e vari spèzi arumatìc.
hyp_text: A l'è 'l cunsum de alimènt d'Indù, la cuina javanesa 'l g'ha un gran repertòri de mangià cunfla, i savor dominanti 'l g'han i javanesi i sòrden de arosmi, i pecc, i sòrden, i sòrden e i sòrden.

src_text: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.

hyp_text: Dunca, la lectura d'incö d'èst gramàtichèr i ghavariss a imparàr di cossa del gramàtich del persian e a capìr melior di fràs.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Lombard]: Tutavia, tücc i belga e i svizér chi parlén francés i ghavarissen imparaa el francés standàrd a scöla e dunca i saressen bùn de capìt anca quand gli ultilizenn el sistema de numeraziùn standard francés.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Lombard]: In di secùi, i persùnn i hann fà sü cun atenziùn teràzi sün di paesàgg ért e in spònda fin a rivà ai scugliér chi i vardén giö el màr.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Lombard]: 800 miglie dol Trans-Alaska Pipeline System a i henn staite serade despò qe la g’é nait fœra un mier de bòts de petroi sgrej a sud de Fairbanks, in Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Lombard]: In tel passà i pàrt del Bèlgi d'incö i fasivén pàrt del Lüssemburg ma i eren diventè Bèlgi dopu la Rivoluziùn Bèlga di ann ‘30 del Vòtcént.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Lombard]: Fin dol comenzament, The Onion ‘l é divegnud un vir imper de la paròdia de nœve, con un edizion stampada, un sit web qe ‘l g’ha trad 5.000.000 de visitator uniq ind ol mis de otover, publicità personalle, un network de notizie 24 h e un atlant mondiall lançad de recent ciamad Our Dumb World.

src_text: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
ref_text: Si cuma al lùr cülmin la poluzion dei lüs l’era mia el géner de problèma che l’è incö, despèss ieren in di cità o campus, sübit ragiungii rispèt a quei fà sù in di témp mòderni.
hyp_text: In tel passà, quand i gh'èra la pollusiùn de la lüsch, i eren de la tipologia che i n'èra no de quela che i gh'èra ind al passà, i gh'èra de solit in di cità o in di campus, a pòst che i eren pussee fàcil de cönt a quij che i gh'èra fàit in temp modern.
